meanings.definition: The state or quality of being huffy.
meanings.sent1: Her huffinesses were evident when she crossed her arms and pouted.
meanings.sent2: His huffinesses often led to unnecessary arguments with his friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat's huffinesses were on full display when it refused to eat the new food.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds in the sky mirrored the huffinesses of the storm brewing within her.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's huffinesses made the students uneasy in the classroom.

meanings.sent1: After the argument, there were visible huffinesses in her posture.
meanings.sent2: His huffinesses were short-lived as he quickly realized his mistake.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's huffinesses over not getting the toy were quickly forgotten when offered a snack.
meanings.sent4: The huffinesses in the room were palpable, making everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The huffinesses in her tone indicated she needed some time alone to cool off.
